name: operations-orchestration-api
description: HPE's Operations Orchestration (OO) client API module for NodeJS

scripts.coverage: node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Liran Tal <liran.tal@gmail.com> (http://www.enginx.com)
